00003 def exists(env):
00004         return true

00006 def generate(env):
00007 
00008         def Check_libart2(context):
00009                 import SCons.Util
00010                 context.Message('Checking for libart2 ... ')
00011                 ret = context.TryAction('libart2-config --version')[0]
00012                 if ret: 
00013                         ver = os.popen('libart2-config --version').read().strip().split('.')
00014                         if (int(ver[0])*1000000 + int(ver[1])*1000 + int(ver[2]))<2003008: 
00015                                 ret = False;
00016                         else:
00017                                 env['CXXFLAGS_LIBART'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( 
00018                                         os.popen('libart2-config --cflags').read().strip() );
00019                                 env['LINKFLAGS_LIBART'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( 
00020                                         os.popen('libart2-config --libs').read().strip() );
00021                 env['CACHED_LIBART'] = ret;
00022                 context.Result(ret)
00023                 return ret
00024 
00025         from SCons.Options import Options
00026         import os
00027 
00028         optionFile = env['CACHEDIR'] + 'libart.cache.py'
00029         opts = Options(optionFile)
00030         opts.AddOptions(
00031                 ('CACHED_LIBART', 'Whether libart2 is available'),
00032                 ('CXXFLAGS_LIBART',''),
00033                 ('LINKFLAGS_LIBART',''),
00034                 )
00035         opts.Update(env)
00036         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('CACHED_LIBART')):
00037                 conf = env.Configure(custom_tests =      { 'Check_libart2' : Check_libart2 } )
00038 
00039                 if not conf.Check_libart2():
00040                         print 'libart2 >= 2.3.8 not found (mandatory).'
00041 
00042                 env = conf.Finish()
00043                 opts.Save(optionFile, env)
